actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to settle an agreement dated July 30, 1943, between the Secretary of the Interior of the United States, the State of North Carolina, and the Tennessee Valley Authority, and Swain County, North Carolina.
short_title: Swain County Just Compensation Act of 1991

summary.text: Swain County Just Compensation Act of 1991 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to Swain County, North Carolina, in full and complete settlement of all claims against the United States, the Department of the Interior, and the Tennessee Valley Authority arising out of a specified agreement to compensate the county for the loss of a highway.

titles.title: Swain County Just Compensation Act of 1991

A bill to settle an agreement dated July 30, 1943, between the Secretary of the Interior of the United States, the State of North Carolina, and the Tennessee Valley Authority, and Swain County, North Carolina.
